attributes.action: take steps to block the construction of a creationist theme park in Lancashire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Further details of the proposed theme park can be found in the Observer, 16/12/07 p.11 or on the observer-guardian website.

This is a worrying development in the spread of religious indoctrination, particularly of children, in the UK. Legislation must be tightened in order to prevent such breaches of the stability of our secular society.
